document.full_text: a danish pharmaceutical company, lundbeck, has become the latest company to supply a lethal injection drug to u.s. death penalty states, making it the target of campaigners.
document.title: letter from europe: drug company in cross hairs of death penalty opponents
lines_and_colors: a danish pharmaceutical company, lundbeck, has become the latest company to supply a lethal injection drug to u.s. death penalty states, making it the target of campaigners.
